messages.subject: unschooling the younger ones
messages.msgSnippet: ... curricula, plans and schedules. I m planning to unsub, but haven t gotten around to it. There s a preschool-age folder on the unschooling.com message
messages.messageBody:
>>There is a pre-unschooling list on Yahoo, but it's all full of
curricula, plans and schedules. I'm planning to unsub, but haven't
gotten around to it.>>

There's a preschool-age folder on the unschooling.com message boards. I
haven't spent much time there (mine are 8 & 13) but I doubt that curriculum
talk is the focus there. Might be another resource for folks to check out.
:o)

Life is good.
~Mary
